name: moc
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for man or men of colour: a man who does not consider himself to be white, or men who do not consider themselves to be white: A group of colleagues, all men of colour (MOC) and women of colour (WOC), were walking across campus. A MoC participant described being bullied in school.
More examplesFewer examplesThe corresponding percentages for MOC are more similar to white men than to WOC.Research has documented the persistent disparate outcomes for underrepresented men of colour (MOC) in postsecondary education.The racial makeup of the school was 60% white women, 40% white men, 6% Women of Colour (WoC) and 4% Men of Colour (MoC).
